document_data.name: Slum Market
document_data.mainbody: The '''Slum Market''' in [[Phlan]] around [[1367 DR]] was a marketplace where unbelievable bargains could be had as long as the buyer was fine with items of dubious quality.
document_data.Locations: The Slum Market was found in the southwest section of Phlan.
document_data.Activities: It was said about the Slum Market that you would be unlikely to see the same merchant two days in a row. In addition to the questionable commerce that thrived here, pickpockets infested the area looking for easy targets.
